TERMS OF SERVICE

Terms of Service

Welcome to Craftal CRO. By purchasing our services, you agree to the following terms.

Services

We provide website design and related digital services as described on our site. Specific details, timelines, and deliverables may be outlined in individual agreements or invoices.

Payments

All payments are due as stated during checkout or in your invoice. Work may begin only after payment (or deposit, if applicable) is received.

Refunds

Due to the nature of digital design services, payments are generally non-refundable once work has started. If you believe you are entitled to a refund, please contact us and we will review your request.

Client Responsibilities

You agree to provide accurate information, materials, and timely feedback needed for us to complete your project. Delays in providing these may affect timelines.

Intellectual Property

Upon full payment, ownership of the final design deliverables is transferred to you. We retain the right to showcase completed work in our portfolio unless otherwise agreed.

Limitation of Liability

We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services or website.

Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of any changes.

Contact Us
